title: Open Email
description: Use for information regarding email interaction open email events.

xdm:environment.title: Environment
xdm:environment.description: The information related to web page and link of the ExperienceEvent.

xdm:operatingSystem.title: Operating system
xdm:operatingSystem.description: The name of the operating system used when the observation was made. The attribute should not contain any version information such as '10.5.3', but instead contain 'edition' designations such as 'Ultimate' or 'Professional'.

xdm:browserDetails.title: Browser details
xdm:browserDetails.description: The browser specific details such as browser name, version, javascript version, user agent string, and accept language.

xdm:userAgent.title: User agent
xdm:userAgent.description: The HTTP user-agent string from the client request.

xdm:model.title: Model
xdm:model.description: The name of the model for the device. This is the common, human-readable, or marketing name for the device. For example, the 'iPhone 6S' is a particular model of mobile phone.
